Hello, I'm
a Front end Developer

I am a passionate front-end developer with over 5 years of experience in building intuitive and dynamic user interfaces. I specialize in creating seamless user experiences using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
My goal is to craft visually appealing and highly functional web applications that delight users.

Skill and Expertise

  • Languages & Frameworks: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React, Angular, Vue.js
  • Tools & Technologies: SASS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, Git, Webpack, Babel
  • Performance Optimization: Expertise in optimizing web applications for speed and efficiency

Problem-Solving Approach

I excel at translating complex requirements into elegant, functional web applications. I thrive on solving challenging problems and continuously learning new technologies to stay ahead in the ever-evolving web development
I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and adhering to best practices to ensure the longevity and scalability of the projects I work on.

Built a task management application to help users track and manage their daily tasks efficiently. Key functionalities include:

  1. Real-time data synchronization using Firebase.
  2. Drag-and-drop interface for easy task organization.
  3. User authentication and secure data storage.

Favourite poem

Still I Rise

   
            You may write me down in history
    With your bitter, twisted lies,
    You may trod me in the very dirt
    But still, like dust, I'll rise.

    Does my sassiness upset you?
    Why are you beset with gloom?
    ’Cause I walk like I've got oil wells
    Pumping in my living room.

Passion & Growth

Dedicated to lifelong learning and professional growth, I regularly attend industry conferences, participate in hackathons, and contribute to open-source projects. I am always eager to explore new technologies and methodologies to enhance my skill set and deliver exceptional results.

I am a strong communicator with extensive experience working in agile teams. I have collaborated closely with designers and backend developers to deliver high-quality products on time. My ability to articulate ideas clearly and listen actively has been key to the success of many projects.
